      • Task

        public Task(java.lang.String description,
    int estimatedDuration,
    int acceptableDeviation,
    java.util.List<Task> dependencies,
    Task alternativeFor,
    java.util.Map<ResourceType,java.lang.Integer> resourceTypes)
     throws java.lang.IllegalStateException,
            java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        The first constructor of task. This will create a task with the given parameters
        Parameters:
        description - The description of the task
        estimatedDuration - The estimated duration of the task
        acceptableDeviation - The acceptable deviation of the task
        dependencies - The list of dependencies of the task
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - The description cannot be null
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - The estimatedDuration is negative
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - The acceptableDeviation is negative
        java.lang.IllegalStateException

      • addTimeSpan

        public void addTimeSpan(boolean failed,
               org.joda.time.DateTime startTime,
               org.joda.time.DateTime endTime)
                 throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException,
                        IllegalDateException,
                        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        This will create a new timespan for the task
        Parameters:
        startTime - The start time of the timespan
        endTime - The end time of the timespan
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - The startTime cannot be equal to null
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - The endTime is equal to null
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - Exception will be thrown if the end time is earlier than the start time
        IllegalDateException

      • checkResourceTypeSelfConflicting

        private boolean checkResourceTypeSelfConflicting(ResourceType resourceType,
                                       int amount)
        Returns a boolean indicating whether the resource type is self conflicting or not
        Parameters:
        resourceType - The resource type to be checked
        amount - The amount of resources needed of this type
        Returns:
        Returns true if the amount is larger than 1 and if the resource type is self conflicting
